description:
* Based on the 4-koma manga by http://anidb.net/cr6366 [Yoshimizu Kagami], serialised in http://anidb.net/cr30434 [Comptiq].
Having fun at school is all about doing homework together, cooking and eating, playing video games, and watching anime. All those little things make up the daily life of the anime- and chocolate-loving http://anidb.net/ch2999 [Izumi Konata] and her friends...

REGULAR.description:
Anime super fan Konata and her friends debate the proper way to eat desserts and learn the difference between the flu and the common cold before paying a visit to a sick classmate.
Source: crunchyroll

Kagami and Tsukasa spend Golden Week together, but while Kagami’s been making time to work on her homework, Tsukasa hasn’t even started!
Source: crunchyroll

Konata schools the girls on how to win mail-in contests. Then, they discuss myths surrounding twins, the pros and cons of rainy days, and switching up hair styles.
Source: crunchyroll

Konata always has a creative excuse for her habitual tardiness, but karma comes back to bite her when she actually gets sick and isn’t given permission to miss class.
Source: crunchyroll

The girls put on their yukata and head to a summer festival where they meet Konata’s cousin Yui.
Source: crunchyroll

The girls head to the beach for some much-needed summer fun!
Source: crunchyroll

School is back in session, but Konata isn’t acting like herself, and Miyuki has to make it through the day without her glasses.
Source: crunchyroll

The athletic festival kicks off, and the girl’s pick their events before dishing about whatever’s on their minds.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Não precisa de mim para uma explosão

REGULAR.description:
With exams around the corner, the girls discuss good study habits.
Source: crunchyroll

Tsukasa gets a new phone, the twins meet Konata’s dad, and the girls visit an anime shop where they attract the attention of the unique staff.
Source: crunchyroll

The approaching holidays spark conversations about Santa Claus, Christmas cake, and final exams.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As diversas maneiras de se passar a véspera do Natal
Various Ways to Spend Christmas Eve
いろんな聖夜の過ごし方

REGULAR.description:
The girls head to a dōjinshi convention before attending a New Year’s festival.
Source: crunchyroll

With the New Year on their minds, the girls talk about diets and various food traditions.
Source: crunchyroll

Konata’s younger cousin comes to stay with her after she’s accepted to the same high school as the other girls.
Source: crunchyroll

The girls go to a live concert event, and April Fools gives Konata the perfect chance to prank Kagami.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: いきなりは変われない

REGULAR.description:
Kagami, Tsukasa, and Miyuki visit the cosplay café where Konata works.
Source: crunchyroll

It’s Konata’s birthday, but her surprise party doesn’t go exactly as planned!
Source: crunchyroll

The girls discuss what kinds of animals they’re most like, Konata asks Miyuki about her vision, and Yutaka spends the day with her new friends.
Source: crunchyroll

Konata and her father discuss the Gundam franchise, Nanako gets a little jealous of Miyuki, and Yutaka asks Hiyori about her dōjinshi.
Source: crunchyroll

A study session turns into a trip to a fireworks festival where Konata and her friends run into Yutaka’s group.
Source: crunchyroll

The third-year girls take a trip to Kyoto to visit Kyoto Animation. Tsukasa spends some time with the local wildlife, and Kagami receives a letter from a boy!
Source: crunchyroll

The spirit of Konata’s mother appears to check in on her and reminisce about the times she spent with Konata’s father.
Source: crunchyroll

Konata and Yutaka are both under the weather—giving Konata the perfect excuse to stay home and play video games!
Source: crunchyroll

The school’s cultural festival brings all the girls together to work on a group cheer routine!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lucky Channel in New Tokyo Circuit
「らつきー☆ちゃんねる in 新東京サーキット」
「らつきー☆れーさー」ダイジェスト版
らき☆すた in 武道館 第1部
らき☆すた in 武道館 第2部
らき☆すた in 武道館 第3部
